name: Release 5.2.5
body:
### Fixed
- Issue [#194](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/194): logging URL generation, by @HardNorth
- Issue [#195](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/195): `None` mode exception, by @HardNorth

name: Release 5.2.4
body:
### Changed
- `LogManager` class moved from `core` package to `logs` package, by @HardNorth
### Fixed
- Issue [#192](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/192): launch URL generation, by @HardNorth

name: Release 5.2.3
body:
### Added
- Ability to pass client instance in `RPLogHandler` constructor, by @HardNorth
- Issue [#179](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/179): batch logging request payload size tracking, by @HardNorth
### Fixed
- Issue [#184](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/184): early logger initialization exception, by @dagansandler

name: Release 5.2.2
body:
### Fixed
- Issue [#182](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/182): logger crash on empty client, by @HardNorth

### Fixed
- Issue [#180](https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/issues/180): logger crash on attachments, by @HardNorth
### Changed
- Log processing does not stop on the first error now, by @HardNorth

### Added
- test item 'retry' parameter processing by @rplevka
- timeout parameter processing by @rb1 
- Nested Steps support by @HardNorth 
- Logging API by @HardNorth 
### Fixed
- Client connection failures now ignored to avoid test interruption by @HardNorth

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/reportportal/client-Python/compare/5.1.0...5.2.0

### Added
- New client implementation with log processing in a separate thread

### Added
- Test manager integrated into RPClient
### Fixed
- `Bearer` token type now sends according to RFC (start from a capital letter)

Release notes:
- Added batch processing to the terminate method

Release notes:
- Always use the log_batch mechanism for sending log messages

Release notes:
- Updated requirement for the six package
- Added support for the rerun functionality
- Implemented a simple polling for get_launch_info()
- Implemented a new method for querying launch ID
- Implemented sending events to Google Analytics
- Moved functionality for getting system information to helpers

Release notes:
- Added a common generator for items' attributes for agents
- Added support for the codeRef APi parameter
- Fixed an issue with ABC import in newer Python versions
- Added pre-commit instructions
- Fixed an issue with duplicate agent name being returned by the get_system_information()
- Updated contribution guidelines
- Created release workflow

Release notes:
- Fixed CPU type reported in Docker/Virtual environments
- Increased max number of HTTP pool connections to 50

Release notes:
- Added support for the item update call
- Added interface for gathering system information for the agents
- Aligned to PEP8 and PEP257
- Added automatic check for PEP257 requirements

Release notes:
- Fixed invalid syntax issue importing ReportPortalService class

Release notes:
- Raise the version up to match the version of Report Portal
- Add support for nested steps

### Release notes:

- Report Portal version 5 support.

### Release notes:

- Various bug fixes

## Re-license under Apache 2.0

with this version we switch from restrictive GPL3.0 to Apache2.0

if you still need to use it under GPL3.0, please fork own version from this commit #32

Release Notes:
 - Force finish (stopping) launch is added.

Release Notes:
 - Code clean-up (more "pythonic" style, backwards incompatible).
 - Log messages with and without attachment.
 - Batch log uploads with ability to specify batch size.
 - Background batch uploads (asynchronous mode).

Release Notes:
 - Fixed issue with uri join on Windows platform.
 - Added ability to upload binary attachment.
